mapper.select: SELECT id , name , label , IFNULL(cview.sort, 999999) AS `sort` FROM cmdb_viewconst a LEFT JOIN cmdb_view cview ON a.id = cview.item_id AND cview.type = 'const' AND cview.ci_id = #{ciId} ORDER BY sort

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT attr.id AS itemId, attr.`name` AS itemName, attr.`label` AS itemLabel, 'attr' AS type, v.show_type AS showType, v.allow_edit AS allowEdit, IFNULL(v.sort, 999999) AS sort, if(ci.id = #{ciId}, 0, 1) AS isExtended, '' AS uniqueKey FROM cmdb_ci ci JOIN cmdb_attr attr ON ci.id = attr.ci_id LEFT JOIN cmdb_view v ON attr.`id` = v.`item_id` AND v.`ci_id` = #{ciId} AND v.`type` = 'attr' WHERE ci.lft <= ( SELECT lft FROM `cmdb_ci` WHERE id = #{ciId} ) AND ci.rht >= ( SELECT rht FROM `cmdb_ci` WHERE id = #{ciId} ) UNION SELECT rel.id AS itemId, rel.to_name AS itemName, rel.to_label AS itemLabel, 'relfrom' AS type, v.show_type AS showType, v.allow_edit AS allowEdit, IFNULL(v.sort, 999999) AS sort, if(ci.id = #{ciId}, 0, 1) AS isExtended, CONCAT(rel.from_ci_id,'-',rel.to_ci_id) AS uniqueKey FROM cmdb_rel rel JOIN cmdb_ci ci ON rel.from_ci_id = ci.id LEFT JOIN cmdb_view v ON rel.id = v.`item_id` AND v.`type` = 'relfrom' AND v.ci_id = #{ciId} WHERE ci.lft <= ( SELECT lft FROM `cmdb_ci` WHERE id = #{ciId} ) AND ci.rht >= ( SELECT rht FROM `cmdb_ci` WHERE id = #{ciId} ) UNION SELECT rel.id AS itemId, rel.from_name AS itemName, rel.from_label AS itemLabel, 'relto' AS type, v.show_type AS showType, v.allow_edit AS allowEdit, IFNULL(v.sort, 999999) AS sort, if(ci.id = #{ciId}, 0, 1) AS isExtended, CONCAT(rel.from_ci_id,'-',rel.to_ci_id) AS uniqueKey FROM cmdb_rel rel JOIN cmdb_ci ci ON rel.to_ci_id = ci.id LEFT JOIN cmdb_view v ON rel.id = v.`item_id` AND v.`type` = 'relto' AND v.ci_id = #{ciId} WHERE ci.lft <= ( SELECT lft FROM `cmdb_ci` WHERE id = #{ciId} ) AND ci.rht >= ( SELECT rht FROM `cmdb_ci` WHERE id = #{ciId} ) UNION SELECT const.id AS itemId, const.name AS itemName, const.label AS itemLabel, 'const' AS type, IFNULL(v.show_type,'none') AS showType, v.allow_edit AS allowEdit, IFNULL(v.sort, 999999) as sort, 0 AS isExtended, '' AS uniqueKey FROM cmdb_viewconst const LEFT JOIN cmdb_view v ON const.id = v.`item_id` AND v.`type` = 'const' AND v.ci_id = #{ciId} ) t
(t.showType IN
#{item}
OR t.showType is NULL )
ORDER BY sort,type,itemId
